WorkItem.Description: When syncing from Wowhead, gear shows 1 Emblem of Triumph.  Should be X Emblem of Triumph + 1 Trophy of the Crusade
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] UI not correct for Trophy gear

Comments.Message: Rawr is stuck with the data that comes from WowHead & Armory.   Until their XML data gives better info, there isn't much that can be done to easily fix this.

We can't fix this



** Closed by Jothay 11/27/2009 4:07 PM
I'm not sure this is accurate. Have we tested whether Wowhead/Armory both return 1, or 75?

Armory returns 75 emblems of triumph and Wowhead returns 1 emblem of triumph.     Returning the 1 is actually more useful as it allows you to filter them separate to the 232 items.    Neither of them mention the fact you also need a trophy.

I really don't think there is too much that can be done about this without talking to Wowhead (unless the MMO-Champion data is better and that functionality is added to Rawr.
OK, I'll hit Sko up about it.

Also just FYI - for some issues, closing as "Cannot Fix" means that others will not be able to find the issue in the future.  We should probably have a "Cannot Fix" component or something to make note of technical issues that keep the issues search able w/o forcing users to have to look through old closed issues.
